snippet: The onslaught of Sunni militants in Iraq will have violent repercussions in Syria and could bring wider war in the Middle East, the panel said.
lead_paragraph: The onslaught of Sunni militants in Iraq will have violent repercussions in Syria and could bring wider war in the Middle East, the panel said.

headline.main: Extremist Groups in Iraq Threaten Regional War, U.N. Panel Warns
